1051660.name: Space Adventure TD Demo
1051660.description:
Tired of low polished TD mobile game? Well, I was when I decided to work on Space Adventure TD.
Fan of the genre, I started playing TD back in Starcraft and Warcraft III and was disappointed to see TD migrating and be confined to mobile.

Space Adventure TD offers you:

  • A desktop 3D game, created with passion
  • A 20 levels campaign, story driven with 4 difficulty levels (only 2 levels in the demo)
  • 2 challenge levels with ranked leaderboards (not in the demo)
  • 35 unique towers
  • 70 upgrades
  • 8 different biomes
  • Skillpoints to use in order to boost and unblock towers (with real strategic choices)
  • 2 languages available for now: English and French (more to come)
1051660.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
